snippet: A reality series, “Clean Break,” by the Schick Hydro razor, will neither mention nor show the razor. It will only refer to the brand with “Presented by Schick Hydro” messages.
abstract: Andrew Adam Newman Advertising column; Clean Break reality series sponsored by Schick Hydro razor is taking the unusual step of neither mentioning nor showing the product, referring to the brand only with occasional 'Presented by Schick Hydro' messages.
lead_paragraph: A reality series, “Clean Break,” by the Schick Hydro razor, will neither mention nor show the razor. It will only refer to the brand with “Presented by Schick Hydro” messages.

headline.seo: Schick Sponsors a Reality TV Series - Advertising
headline.main: Getting Out of a Rut With Help From Schick
headline.print_headline: Getting Out of a Rut With Help From Schick
